metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2050 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The get_abbrev_array_info function in libdwarf-20151114 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds write) via a craftedelf file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2050` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1').
